headline: Manager, Digital at Melbourne IT
interests: The Internet, Human Computer Interaction and Usability, Basketball, Waterskiing, Web Programming, Java Programming, cloud computing, mobile, responsive design

job.descriptionSnippet: Your primary role as Web Technical Lead will be to lead a cross functional team in online projects within the Digital Team, primarily in the eCommerce and Self-Service space.The Technical Lead will work closely with our Senior Agile BA (Iteration Manager), Marketing and Operations teams and will supervise our Manila and Melbourne based development teams to ensure the Web platforms are healthy, and

Your primary role as Web Technical Lead will be to lead a cross functional team in online projects within the Digital Team, primarily in the eCommerce and Self-Service space.The Technical Lead will work closely with our Senior Agile BA (Iteration Manager), Marketing and Operations teams and will supervise our Manila and Melbourne based development teams to ensure the Web platforms are healthy, and

Melbourne IT helps organisations of all sizes to successfully do business online. Our complete portfolio of Internet-based technology services drives business effectiveness and profitability for more than 350,000 customers around the world. The breadth of our offering extends from helping small businesses build an online presence through to managing the complex technology environments of large ent

values.summary:
* Team leadership/management (Max team size 15)
* Change management
* Web architecture, Web API design & development
* Led DevOps initiative in ITS Dev; includes transition to public/private cloud, continuous deployment, complete environment automation (puppet) + release automation and ChatOps
* Iterative development using Scrum/Agile

* Promote developer-centric culture
* Deliver custom B2C, B2B and B2B2C web portal for MIT Transformation programme ($1M+ budget)
* Love Web
values.title: Manager, Web Development

values.summary:
* Introduced Agile Development (Scrum) & build automation to improve time to market, improve collaboration and reduce waste improving nr deployment rate > 500%
* Introduced a fraud detection system > 2 weeks into online channel reducing fraud ~0% of online transaction, saving on charge-backs, domain name registries and manual labour
* B2B, B2C and B2B2C systems support
* New product launches into Online and Call Centre channels
* Served as an SME and Tech Lead on Transformation Project, overseeing the Web stream
* Lead offshore development initiative in Web arena
* Introduced Enterprise CMS to reduce manual development
* Development ambassador, pushing a development-centric culture. Introduction of Hack-days.
values.title: Web Team Leader

values.summary:

values.title: Founding Director

values.title: Web Developer

values.summary:
* Budgets and labour forecasting
* Stock inventoring

* Management training
* Made delicious hamburgers
values.title: Manager

values.description:
Led a staged migration of the Melbourne IT Web platforms from existing internal, physical Solaris infrastructure to commodity Intel environment running RHEL.

Summary:

   * Scope: Migration of MIT website and sub-systems, including eCommerce, Renewal, Self-Service and CMS Managed legacy components tied heavily to existing environments

   * Deployment automation of complex environment via internally built engine (project Godspeed) and distributed RPM packages

   * Re-architected to suit HA environment, including a layer 7 reverse proxy (Nginx) for performance, security and flexibility in configuration with the services that comprise the overall web platform

   * Revised DR strategy for existing integrated internal systems

   * Implementation of major infra-as-code principles and leveraging as Puppet, Jenkins CI and Git as core components

   * Integration with a centralised sys-logging platform and Splunk data sink
   * Focus on increased use and reliance monitoring and reporting tools for proactive system health, including Graphite, NewRelic, Sentry, Splunk and Nagios.

   * Close collaboration with Operations team to ensure 

Key successes: 

   * Increased conversion, cross-product attachment & engagement rates
   * Avg. deployment time reduced from 1 hour to less than 15 mins

   * Decrease in page loading times between 30-50%

   * Significant reduction in website error rate

   * Increase in website Apdex \ NPS

   * Shifted Web Dev and Operations working paradigm to a more open, collaborative and proactive partnership
values.name: Melbourne IT AWS Migration \ "DevOps"

values.description:
Currently working with a startup to implement a disruptive mobile application prototype in the Marketing / Advertising space. The business details cannot be disclosed at this time, however I am working as a Solution Architect and also a Developer to the client as there are a number of parties required to deliver the project and requires technical coordination.

Technical Summary:

   * Scala based application including RESTful API
   * Utilization of both SQL & NoSQL databases for specific requirements, including transactional and large file storage/retrieval
   * AngularJS front end using Iconic library (PhoneGap/Cordova) for mobile app deployment
   * Integration with external systems
   * Initial deployment to a cloud environment (Heroku, AWS etc.)
values.name: Startup - Mobile App (Advertising)

values.description:
Summary:

   * Major redesign of flagship Melbourne IT website (www.melbourneit.com.au)
   * Goal to reduce web foot print and time-to-market
   * Adoption of AngularJS as the main UI framework
   * Staged weight loss strategy from existing PHP/Java frameworks into Restful, API driven UIs 

Key Successes:

   * Achieved sub 1-second domain search (fastest of all major competitors)
   * Increased domain search engagement
   * Increased domain name conversion rates
   * Deployment of RESTful API (Migration from legacy SOAP/RPC services)
values.name: Melbourne IT Website Refresh (In Progress)

values.description:
Part of an ongoing initiative to re-align the technical and business support platforms that will underpin Melbourne ITs future growth strategies, including M&A activities.

In 1 year, Melbourne IT was able to deliver Oracle Siebel, BRM, Fusion (AIA) and OBIEE and a fully integrated, custom Web solution tailored to Melbourne IT's domain name oriented business via a custom integration API.

I was responsible for the technical delivery of the following streams of work, run as Agile projects and a budget of over $1M:

- eCommerce (shop) website 
- Customer Self-Service portal
- Identity and Access Management (IAM) system
- Provisioning Fallout Interfaces
- Design of JSON-based, RESTful API abstracting the new Oracle Business Support Systems (above) enabling internal and external clients a modern integration point (delivered by solution partner Rubicon Red)

Achievements:

- Delivered on-time and within budget
- A better platform for our customers, newer products, automated provisioning
- Only mobile/tablet optimised Account console in our industry
- Increased Net Promoter Score (customer satisfaction)
values.name: Transformation

values.description:
2013
* Conversion rate optimisation of online Renewing customers
* Significantly increased MRR via attachment rates
* Collaborated with Marketing / Product to deliver integrated experience
* Delivered using offshore resources (resource constrained due to Transformation)
* Positive growth in 2013, first time during Transformation programme

2014
* Improving speed/performance (move to cloud and new technology)
* Refreshing UX for design consistency & aesthetics
* Significant new product launches
* Increased NPS score
* Added mobile/tablet responsive design
* Achieved 16% conversion rate lift from previous conversion base levels.
values.name: Renewal - Conversion Rate Optimisation

values.description:
Substantiate is Australia's leading provider of tax logbook services and products, using a mix of technology and in-house expertise to provide innovative solutions to clients.

Product:

* Tax consulting
* Automate analysis of FBT, FTC and other tax legislation using GPS data and publicly available road databases (Australian road databases + Open Street Map)
* Produce ATO compliant reports for lodgement by client

Project responsibilities:

* Leveraging the Skylock platform's GPS capabilities (see other project) extend the Architecture to support reporting and analysis needs of the Substantiate arm of the business
* Create web reporting interface
* Create generic data ingestion platform for bulk, one-off analyses
* Use of data analysis tools (Hadoop ecosystem, NoSQL databases, R etc.) to look at other financial opportunities for clients
* Ad-hoc data analysis and reporting (Generally Ruby Scripting around above tools)
values.name: Substantiate - GPS logbook solutions

values.description:
SkyLock is a cloud-based security product, providing an affordable and intuitive GPS tracking solution for the recreational vehicle market (Cars, Caravans, Boats etc.)

Core product features:

* 24/7 monitoring
* Intuitive Web interface with near-real time event tracking
* Geofencing, Tow alarms, speed alerts and more

Project responsibilities:

* Design and deliver solution architecture
* Implementation of secure (OAuth2) RESTful API, integration middleware and micro-service components (Fuse ESB \ MoM \ JEE)
* Oversee Web Development (Spring MVC) stream
* Setup and deployment of HA infrastructure to AWS cloud, including CI and deployment automation
values.name: Skylock - Cloud-based GPS Security Portal

values.description:
Part of an E2E solution that delivered industries highest auto-renewal rates for domain names (> 80%)

* UX implementation and careful interaction design played critical role in opting in more customers and reduction in opt-out
* Worked with talented Marketing group on communications (on/offline)
values.name: Auto-renewal

values.description:
The transformation programme is an IT integration and business transformation project brought about primarily to standardise business functions & processes, and to consolidate core customer information into a single system. This would enable Melbourne IT to more efficiently manage its customers, improve service offerings and 

I have served in a Solution Architect type role around the Web Properties integration piece which forms the all-important pointy part of the value chain – the direct interaction between Melbourne IT and its customers.

My involvement in the project to date has included the following:
* Acting as a Subject Matter Expert (SME), providing advice on scoping and preparing the Web sub-project's business requirements
* High-level design for integrating existing websites, service portals, the new Oracle suite and our existing legacy systems
* Technical lead, including mid-level and detailed designs for the implementation of 5 sub-streams.
values.name: Business Transformation Programme (IWS)

values.recommendationText:
Matt is a true all rounder.  Not only is he the most talented developer I know, he is a brilliant manager and gifted leader.  

Matt thrives under pressure and has been repeatedly recognised by Melbourne IT for his outstanding contributions.  His broad understanding of programming, architecture and methodologies has also led Matt to become a respected thought leader within Melbourne IT.  Despite the increased demand from all levels of the business, Matt still finds the time to mentor staff, deliver projects on time and drive innovation.

Among his recent achievements Matt has championed movements towards agile development, continuous integration, cloud infrastructure, and the development of a RESTful API that will transform the way Melbourne IT builds applications into the future.

Having seen the skill, energy and passion Matt brings to his work I have no doubt that he would make a valuable addition to any company.

Matt is an extremely diligent individual and the most respected employee at Melbourne IT. His intelligence and approach to work are highly regarded. I have no second thoughts in saying that he will be a huge asset to any organization.

Matt has got to be one of the most amazing people I've ever worked with! I highly enjoyed working with him on a regular basis. With strong interpersonal and people management skills and a passion for the web, Matt has easily earned the trust and respect of his team and the wider ITS group. Matt has significant experience within the web development arena, and I am confident he can achieve more as he has the intelligence, potential and drive. I miss working with Matt, as well as making cupcakes for his team. :) All the best, Matt!

summary:
Experienced Development Thought Leader with over 8 commercial years delivering eCommerce Web Applications. Strong online B2C, B2B and API capability with some conversion rate optimisation experience.

I'm an adaptive leader, and challenge teams to think differently about software delivery; no one approach or technology works in all situations. Agile and DevOps are just labels, it's how you approach software delivery that really matters.

You'll find me hacking on GitHub in my spare time in Ruby, Scala & Angular, and have 8+ years experience in Java, PHP, and your HTML5/JS stack.

I love the Web, I love to challenge the status quo and love what I do.
